attributes.action: guyfawkes night to be celebrated with fireworks for one night only 5th November
attributes.additional_details: Some results of this are even death in animals due to exhaustion and heart attacks, one day would be manageable to most but 2 weeks is just not acceptable
attributes.background: Guyfolks night is being celebrated with fireworks displays from a week before to a week after, people with pets, old people, disabled people, people with young children and many more are struggling with not only the mess but with the load bangs
